FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='arena_alloc',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          args=
            ParamList(
              params[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='arena',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    PtrDecl(
                      quals=[],
                      type=
                        TypeDecl(
                          declname='arena',
                          quals=[],
                          align=None,
                          type=
                            IdentifierType(
                              names=['Arena'],
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
              params[1]=
                Decl(
                  name='size',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='size',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['size_t'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            PtrDecl(
              quals=[],
              type=
                TypeDecl(
                  declname='arena_alloc',
                  quals=[],
                  align=None,
                  type=
                    IdentifierType(
                      names=['void'],
                    )
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='<=',
              left=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='+',
                  left=
                    StructRef(
                      type='->',
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='arena',
                        )
                      field=
                        ID(
                          name='offset',
                        )
                    )
                  right=
                    ID(
                      name='size',
                    )
                )
              right=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='1024',
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='ptr',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    PtrDecl(
                      quals=[],
                      type=
                        TypeDecl(
                          declname='ptr',
                          quals=[],
                          align=None,
                          type=
                            IdentifierType(
                              names=['void'],
                            )
                        )
                    )
                  init=
                    UnaryOp(
                      op='&',
                      expr=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            StructRef(
                              type='->',
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='arena',
                                )
                              field=
                                ID(
                                  name='memory',
                                )
                            )
                          subscript=
                            StructRef(
                              type='->',
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='arena',
                                )
                              field=
                                ID(
                                  name='offset',
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[1]=
                Assignment(
                  op='+=',
                  lvalue=
                    StructRef(
                      type='->',
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='arena',
                        )
                      field=
                        ID(
                          name='offset',
                        )
                    )
                  rvalue=
                    ID(
                      name='size',
                    )
                )
              block_items[2]=
                Return(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='ptr',
                    )
                )
            )
          iffalse=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Return(
                  expr=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='0',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
    )
)
